Title: Patti Rocks
Writer: John Jenkins, Karen Landry, David Burton Morris, Chris Mulkey, Victoria Wozniak (characters creator)
Actors: Chris Mulkey, John Jenkins, Karen Landry, Ralph Estlie
Plot: It's Christmas time in the twin cities. Billy's working a lot of overtime, running barges on the Mississippi. He calls his friend Eddie, whom he hasn't seen in six months, and asks a favor: to drive with him to see his pregnant girlfriend, Patti, because Billy hasn't told her he's married and already has two children. The road trip of guy talk becomes a night of truths exchanged between men and women.
